products.name: Bottle Rocket
products.description: Put this rocket in a bottle to make sure it shoots straight up.

products.name: Screamer
products.description: A really annoying firework that makes a lot of noise before exploding in a tiny pop.

products.name: Enormous Heart
products.description: Most of the time this firework explodes in the shape of a pink heart.

products.name: Waterfall
products.description: A lovely firework that makes a shape like a weeping willow with slowly falling white sparkles.

products.name: Pooping Chicken
products.description: This little cardboard chicken poops out ash and then makes a screaming sound.

products.name: Spinning Turtle
products.description: A little plastic bulb that spins and spins with sparkles.

products.name: pop bomb
products.description: Those little things you throw on the ground and they make a pop.

products.name: Firecracker
products.description: For a slightly bigger pop- more like a horrid bang.

products.name: Tiny Amount of TNT
products.description: Just enough to blow your arm off.

products.name: A Lot of TNT
products.description: Volatile and sweaty, use with caution but blows up bridges and old mills with aplomb.

products.name: Nuclear Bomb
products.description: For destroying most of a hemisphere. Make sure you're very far away when this goes off.

products.name: Big Daddy
products.description: A dud, thank goodness (at least we hope) A perfect living-room accessory for the nuclear family.
